title: Killing Lucas
description: Lucas Sherman wanted one thing in life. Never to set eyes on his ex-fianceé Kiloran O’Connor again. But no one said life was fair. Now with a stalker hunting both of them Lucas is forced to put his distrust and hatred to the side to keep them both alive.Kiloran only ever wanted to keep Lucas safe. But no matter how hard she tries danger seems to be a step behind them. Now creating a public front can she break through the wall Lucas has erected around his heart? Those same walls she helped cement.Can true love conquer and forgive all or will it kill them both?
author: Dominique Eastwick
